Sales / Marketing Officer Job at Handyman Daige Properties




        
    

        
        Handyman Daige Properties is a private company in Abuja offering real estate development services. We prioritize delivering customized homes that meet our clients requirements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Marketing Officer
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Real Estate

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are a dynamic and fast-growing real estate firm committed to delivering exceptional property solutions across Abuja and beyond.
	We are currently seeking a proactive and personable Sales, Marketing & Customer Service Officer to join our team and help expand our client base and market presence.
	If you have a passion for sales, marketing, and client engagement—and experience in real estate—this role is for you.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute strategic sales and marketing plans
	Identify and pursue new business opportunities
	Build and maintain strong client relationships
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis
	Represent the company at industry events and client meetings
	Prepare regular sales reports and forecasts
	Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and follow-ups professionally
	Ensure excellent customer experience across all touchpoints.


Requirements


	3 – 5 years of proven experience in sales or marketing and customer service
	Strong communication,interpersonaland negotiation skills
	Ability to work independently and meet targets
	Proficiency in CRM tools and Microsoft Office Suite
	Experience in real estate sales is a strong advantage
	Customer-focused mindset with problem-solving abilities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: victoria.negedu@handymandaige.com using "Sales / Marketing Officer" as the subject of the email.

title: Job Openings at Interswstik Nigeria Limited
content:
Interswstik Nigeria Limited (ISNL) is a company engaged in the manufacturing and supply of plastic products. We specialize in producing high-quality plastic materials for various industrial and consumer applications, ensuring durability, functionality, and sustainability. Our operations are built around precision manufacturing, innovation, and meeting the diverse needs of clients across multiple sectors.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Executive

Job Location: Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Sales Executive with a strong background in solar panels, inverters, UPS, and batteries.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving sales, developing new business opportunities, and building long-term client relationships within the renewable energy and power backup sector.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities for solar energy systems, inverters, UPS, and batteries.
	Develop and implement strategies to achieve individual and company sales targets.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with corporate, industrial, and individual clients.
	Conduct market research to identify customer needs, industry trends, and competitor activities.
	Deliver effective product presentations, proposals, and demonstrations to clients.
	Negotiate pricing, contracts, and payment terms to close profitable deals.
	Collaborate with the technical team to provide customized energy solutions to clients.
	Follow up on leads, ensure customer satisfaction, and maintain after-sales relationships.
	Maintain accurate sales records, prepare Daily/weekly/monthly sales reports.
	Represent the company at trade shows, exhibitions, and networking events.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or related field (preferred).
	Proven work experience (3–5 years) as a Sales Executive/Business Development Executive in solar, inverter, UPS, or battery industry.
	Strong technical knowledge of renewable energy and power backup solutions.
	Demonstrated ability to meet or exceed sales targets.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong customer service orientation and problem-solving ability.
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
	Proficiency in MS Office and Execl.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 per month. 

Application Closing Date: 25th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: h.r@d2h.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only candidates residing in Ilupeju and its environs are eligible to apply.

 

 

2.) Human Resource / Admin Manager

Job Location: Ikenne, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties
Recruitment & Staffing:


	Develop and implement recruitment strategies.
	Manage end-to-end recruitment processes (advertising, shortlisting, interviewing, and onboarding).


Employee Relations:


	Foster a positive work environment and manage employee grievances.
	Promote effective communication between management and staff.


Performance Management:


	Design and oversee performance appraisal systems.
	Work with line managers to set KPIs and support employee development.


Training & Development:


	Identify training needs and organize learning programs.
	Support employee career growth and succession planning.


Compensation & Benefits:


	Administer payroll, salary reviews, and employee benefits.
	Ensure competitive and fair compensation structures.


HR Policies & Compliance:


	Develop and update HR policies in line with labor laws and organizational goals.
	Ensure compliance with statutory regulations.


Workforce Planning:


	Analyze and forecast staffing needs.
	Plan strategies to attract and retain top talent.


Health, Safety & Welfare:


	Ensure a safe and conducive working environment.
	Implement employee wellness programs.


HR Administration:


	Maintain accurate employee records.
	Prepare HR reports for management decision-making.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 4 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N200,000 - N220,000 monthly.

Application Closing DateL 29th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: h.r@d2h.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Sales Trainer

Job Location: Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Training Program Development:


	Design and develop sales training materials, manuals, and modules tailored to company products, services, and sales processes.
	Create onboarding programs for new sales hires.


Facilitation of Training Sessions:


	Conduct classroom, workshop, or online training sessions for sales teams.
	Use role-plays, case studies, and simulations to enhance practical learning.


Sales Skills Enhancement:


	Coach staff on prospecting, pitching, negotiation, upselling, cross-selling, and closing techniques.
	Train on handling objections and building customer relationships.


Product Knowledge Training:
